articles.title: NSS 80th Round Survey reveals rising education costs in India
articles.summary: The survey reveals the financial burden of education despite the constitutional guarantee of free education for children aged 6-14 years under Article 21A.
highlights: 55.9% of students attend government schools, while 31.9% attend private unaided schools nationally
Urban areas have higher private school enrolment (51.4%) compared to rural areas (24.3%)
Fees in private schools range from ₹17,988 to ₹33,567 per academic year in rural areas

articles.title: India-Italy Strategic Partnership Elevated
articles.summary: PM Modi and Italian Deputy PM Tajani discuss enhanced cooperation in defense, technology, and trade.
highlights: Italy's Deputy PM Antonio Tajani's visit strengthens bilateral ties
Focus on defense cooperation, technology transfer, and trade expansion
G20 cooperation and Mediterranean-Indo-Pacific connectivity discussed

articles.title: Madras HC Collegium faces scrutiny over judicial appointments
articles.summary: Constitutional questions arise on judicial appointment process transparency and collegium system accountability.
highlights: Article 217 and 224 of the Constitution govern High Court judge appointments
Need for reform in judicial appointments discussed

articles.title: New Climate Finance Framework at COP29
articles.summary: Countries agree on enhanced climate finance mechanisms for developing nations at the latest climate summit.
highlights: New Collective Quantified Goal (NCQG) for climate finance
India's position on climate equity highlighted
